mapper.select: SELECT M.SECTION_NICK ,M.EMP_NAME ,M.YYYYMMDD ,M.TAM_MESSAGE ,M.ALERT_COUNT FROM( SELECT TMG_F_GET_MO(M.HD_CSECTIONID_FK, LAST_DAY(M.TMO_DYYYYMM), 1, M.TMO_CCUSTOMERID, M.TMO_CCOMPANYID, #{lang}) AS SECTION_NICK ,TMG_F_GET_ME_NAME(M.TMO_CEMPLOYEEID, M.HD_DSTARTDATE_CK, 0, M.TMO_CCUSTOMERID, M.TMO_CCOMPANYID) AS EMP_NAME ,TO_CHAR(M.TAM_DDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS YYYYMMDD ,M.TAM_MESSAGE ,ROWNUM AS NUM ,MAX(ROWNUM) KEEP ( DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY ROWNUM) OVER() AS ALERT_COUNT FROM( SELECT * FROM TMG_ALERTMSG A ,(SELECT * FROM TABLE(TMG_SELECT_MONTHLYOUTPUTLIST(#{cust},#{comp},#{secid},#{dyyyymm},#{lang}))) M WHERE M.SALARY_EXCEPT = 0 AND A.TAM_CCUSTOMERID = M.TMO_CCUSTOMERID AND A.TAM_CCOMPANYID = M.TMO_CCOMPANYID AND A.TAM_CEMPLOYEEID = M.TMO_CEMPLOYEEID AND A.TAM_DYYYYMM = M.TMO_DYYYYMM ORDER BY M.HD_CSECTIONID_FK ,M.TMO_CEMPLOYEEID ) M ) M WHERE M.NUM BETWEEN #{numStart,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND #{numEnd,jdbcType=BIGINT} ;
